item.title: Gratitude Journal
item.description: August 5th, 2020 Friends & Ruda Cofee. A blessed childhood. Almost full moon outside my bedroom window. August 6th, 2020 The best cinammon rolls, so far. Modern Family - Season 4. Afternoon with my Grandparents. August 7th, 2020 Surviving 27. Lazy evenings. Teaching something to my mum. August 8th, 2020 Digital love and messages. Laughs with my favorite person in the Universe, my sister.
